resources.string: ERROR: You can only input letter that is adjacent to the previous one.
INCORRECT: You need at least two vowels in word! (-10 pts)
INCORRECT: You need at least 4 chars long! (-10 pts)

Rules:
- Your first letter can start anywhere.
- Subsequent letter connections must “touch” the previous letter. (in any direction, including diagonally.)
- Only use a letter in the current word once.
- All words must utilize a minimum of two vowels.
- cannot generate the same word more than once.
- Words must be at least 4 chars long.
Scoring:
- Every consonant in a word is worth one point.
- Every vowel is worth 5 points.
- use one or more of the consonants ‘S’, ‘Z’, ‘P’, ‘X’ or ‘Q’ the value of the word is doubled.
- Incorrect responses reduce the score by 10 points, regardless of word length.
-There is no time limit.
